about_the_game:
Welcome to Project Grove, a first-person fantasy adventure game about the blazing pursuit of alchemy and friendship.

A plague known as 'The Great Rot' has ravaged all things living and it's up to you, legendary Alchemist Professor Edric Tayte, to discover a cure.

Alongside your side-kick robot, venture through the weird and wonderful world of Dacrima, collect it's fabled flora and fauna and brew a roster of potent Potions. With each new ability gained, explore the deepest depths of the forest, with plenty of secrets to find along the way...


Forage Through the Wilds
Discover the wonders of this charming world! Explore enchanting landscapes rich in resources: from absurd animals, to peculiar plants and precious minerals. Scan your discoveries to unlock lore, potion details and piece together the mystery of the forest. Uncover ways to traverse obstacles, gain access to new areas and complete quests along the way!


Brew New Abilities
Extract essences from each ingredient you collect and fuse different combinations together to brew powerful Potions.
With each Potion you unlock, gain new abilities and discover new ways of venturing through the Wilds.


Jump On Your Best Friend’s Head
Exploring is hard work when you’re in your 70s. Your robot companion L-P1N is your travel guide, best friend and very own placeable platform.
L-P1N is the stowaway you never knew you needed. More than just a tool: it's your best friend, your confidant and your very life is in it’s hands (well, technically it’s head).


Tale of Two Unlikely Friends
Uncover the secrets of the forest and battle against profit and power to save humanity.
In the whacky world of Dacrima, embark on a journey of self-discovery and true friendship.

reviews:
“Really impresses with its gorgeous visuals, chilled out atmosphere and creative puzzle design.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

“Project Grove feels like a delightfully low-stakes, all-ages adventure that anyone could enjoy.”
Game Critics

“You will have to think a little outside the box to get through this section and it is a good precursor to what they could do with a full-sized title.”
Game Tyrant
short_description: Uncover the secrets of the forest in this tale of two unlikely friends, with alchemist Edric Tayte and L-P1N. Forage for weird and wonderful ingredients, brew Potions to empower you with potent abilities, and all the while discovering that this adventure isn't quite what it seems..
